name: Kritika Online: Collector's Edition Pack
detailed_description:
The Kritika Online Collector’s Pack includes a selection of goods and gear to help you on your hero’s journey, including:

  • Infernal Costume—A fiendishly stylish costume, only available from the Collector’s Pack! Each Collector’s Pack contains one costume (account-bound) for your choice of class.
  • Clockwork Weapon Skin—A weapon skin from the golden age of adventure!
  • Steamdrake—Your personal, powerful, fire-breathing dragon pet. Provides you with a pet that can auto-loot for you, as well as summon a larger, more powerful version of itself.
  • Dragonbone Fishing Rod (30 Days)—Boost your fishing power! Fish with triple the bait capacity of a normal fishing rod, for extended fishing trips.
  • 30 Days Dye Mania—Dye your costume any set of colors you want, as many times as you want.
  • 30 Days Elite Status—Get all the advantages of elite status for a full month.
  • Rare Accent Box—A loot box with a chance to contain a rare costume accent!
  • Smart Start Pack—Contains 10 Resurrection Stones, a 3-Day Elite Voucher, and 3 Experience Potions.
about_the_game:
The Kritika Online Collector’s Pack includes a selection of goods and gear to help you on your hero’s journey, including:

  • Clockwork Weapon Skin—A weapon skin from the golden age of adventure!
  • Steamdrake—Your personal, powerful, fire-breathing dragon pet. Provides you with a pet that can auto-loot for you, as well as summon a larger, more powerful version of itself.
  • Dragonbone Fishing Rod (30 Days)—Boost your fishing power! Fish with triple the bait capacity of a normal fishing rod, for extended fishing trips.
  • 30 Days Dye Mania—Dye your costume any set of colors you want, as many times as you want.

short_description: Get the best of Kritika Online, gathered all in one place! The Collector’s Pack sets you up with all the perks and gear you need to carry out your exploits with style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Dual core (2GHz) or higher
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600 / Radeon 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or higher
  • Processor: Quad core (2GHz) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 / Radeon 2850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
